me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api

Interface Chargeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChargeableBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIOMachine, AbstractProcessingMachine, AutoBuilder, BaseSTBMachine, BasicSolarCell, BatteryBox, BigStorageUnit, DenseSolar, EnergyCell, FiftyKBatteryBox, FiftyKEnergyCell, Generator, HeatEngine, HyperStorageUnit, Masher, MultiBuilder, Pump, Sawmill, Smelter, TenKBatteryBox, TenKEnergyCell

    public interface Chargeable
    Represents an STB item or block which can hold energy, meansured in units of SCU: Sensible Charge Units.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCharge()
      Get the current SCU level for this item
      int getChargeRate()
      Get the max rate at which this device can charge or discharge, in SCU/tick.
      int getMaxCharge()
      Get the maximum SCU level for this item
      void setCharge(double charge)
      Change the current SCU level for this item

    • Method Detail

      • getCharge

        double getCharge()
        Get the current SCU level for this item
        Returns:
        the current SCU level

      • setCharge

        void setCharge(double charge)
        Change the current SCU level for this item
        Parameters:
        charge - the new SCU level

      • getMaxCharge

        int getMaxCharge()
        Get the maximum SCU level for this item
        Returns:
        the maximum SCU level

      • getChargeRate

        int getChargeRate()
        Get the max rate at which this device can charge or discharge, in SCU/tick. Note that this does not necessarily limit the amount of charge used when the device is working, only when it is charging/discharging via connected battery block or installed energy cell.
        Returns:
        the max charge rate
